metadata.name: Execution Of Script Located In Potentially Suspicious Directory
metadata.comment: Detects executions of scripts located in potentially suspicious locations such as "/tmp" via a shell such as "bash", "sh", etc.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bash')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/csh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dash')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/fish')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ksh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/zsh'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tmp/')))

output.summary: Detects executions of scripts located in potentially suspicious locations such as "/tmp" via a shell such as "bash", "sh", etc.
